Characters

Air Raid - Fearless Flyer

  1. If Air Raid has an Upgrade that does damage to an enemy, will Air Raidâ€™s ability trigger and let me scrap an Upgrade from that enemy?
    No, unless the Upgrade specifically says that the upgraded character does the damage. Air Raid must do the damage for the ability to trigger.
